
m=number of constraints.
n=dimensinn.
X=n-dimensional box.

A(NLC x NDim+1).  Sum A[i,j]*X[j]<=A[j,NDim+1],
i row for each contraint + value.
j column for each dimension

Algorithm:
Infeasible  =0
Feasible 	=1
Undetermined=2

bool Feasible(pbox pb)
{
 State=Feasible;
 for (int i=0;i<m;i++)
     {
      partial=0;
      for (int j=0;j<n;j++)
          partial+=A[i][j]*pb->x[j];
      V[i]=partial-A[i][n-1];
      if (0 < V[i])
         return Infeasible;
      if (zeroin(V[i]))
         State=undetermined;
     } 
 return State;
}

---
Hola Leo:

Aquí te mando los mátrices.

Each line is a constraint such that sum_j=1..n a(i,j)*x_j <= a(i,n+1)

SimplexEligius:
   0.762000762001143   0.635000635000952  -0.127000127000191
  -0.113592366849413  -0.511165650822358   0.851942751370597
  -0.408248290463863   0.408248290463863   0.816496580927726
